--- select_hint.sql
@{hint1 = 1, hint2 = 2} select hint
--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint: &ast.Hint{
    Atmark:  0,
    Rbrace:  22,
    Records: []*ast.HintRecord{
      &ast.HintRecord{
        Key: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 2,
          NameEnd: 7,
          Name:    "hint1",
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 10,
          ValueEnd: 11,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
      },
      &ast.HintRecord{
        Key: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 13,
          NameEnd: 18,
          Name:    "hint2",
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 21,
          ValueEnd: 22,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "2",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   24,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 31,
          NameEnd: 35,
          Name:    "hint",
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
@{hint1=1, hint2=2} SELECT hint
